title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 3, Phi 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single CLI or Docker container; includes Go server, REST API, and model library.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async APIs, streaming, chat & embed endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama API; simple interface for generate, chat, and pull commands.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI backend, Next.js chat, RAG with Chroma, function calling, etc.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to build and run Ollama declaratively on Linux/macOS.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and llama.cpp for retrieval.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that brings Ollama models to servers with slash commands and thread chats.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama with streaming support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, generate, and model management; includes Blazor sample.
